title: Human Resource Officer Job at DMOT Enterprises
content:
DMOT Enterprises - Our client, a snack factory, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource Officer
Job Location: Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Requirements
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	HND/BSc Degree in Social Sciences or Arts
	We expect candidate with 2 years of HR experience.
	MBA/MSC/MA is MANDATORY
	Experience in manufacturing setting will be good
	Excel and Power-point Usage should be good.
	should be ready https://jornadas.ahf-filosofia.es/ to work in Sagamu and attend interviews.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: ayomaku@yahoo.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
